faq.question: What is this template for?
faq.answer: This template provides the basic structure for creating new Claude skills, including the required frontmatter metadata and documentation format.

faq.question: How do I use this template?
faq.answer: Copy the SKILL.md file, replace the placeholder name and description in the frontmatter, and add your skill's specific instructions in the markdown body below the frontmatter.

faq.question: What fields are required in the frontmatter?
faq.answer: The name and description fields are required in the YAML frontmatter section at the top of the SKILL.md file.
